More fun facts about me

Eva Portelance

Hi! I am a Ph.D. candidate in linguistics at Stanford University and a member of the Stanford NLP Group, the Language and Cognition Lab and ALPS Lab. I am co-advised by Mike C. Frank and Dan Jurafsky. My research intersects computational modeling and language acquisition, though I have also dabled in theoretical syntax and digital humanities.

My pronouns are she/they.
